Pushes urgently against the dashboard and encourages Amy to push, showing determination and quick thinking under pressure.
Attempts to push with his legs despite injury and pain, demonstrating physical resilience and resourcefulness.
Leaps from the Ford when the dashboard won't give, showing situational awareness and adaptability.
Runs to the Peterbilt and tries to stop the driver by jumping on the running board, taking initiative and showing courage.
Falls backward after the door hits his head, momentarily incapacitated but quickly recovers to continue the fight.
Surges into the cab and grapples with Red, engaging physically despite injury, showing determination but possibly risking personal safety.
Engages in violent physical fight with Red, including hitting and grappling aggressively.
Engages physically with Red, fights back by driving a fist to Red's jaw despite the dangerous situation.
Clings to the center support column after falling through the windshield, preventing a fatal fall.
Is overpowered by Red who headbutts him and twists his arm painfully.
Climbs the cab and opens the passenger door to save Red despite Red trying to pull him off.
Encourages Amy to act and tries to help her escape from the precarious situation.
Grabs the windshield wiper blade to steady himself, then seizes the grabhandle on the cab corner to hold on as the truck shifts.
Scales the cab using handholds, climbs past the passenger door despite Red's attempts to pull him off, and boots the door release button to open the door and cause Red to fall away.
Hauls himself onto the bridge with a final exertion and runs to the Ford to help Amy, extending his hand over the void.
Reaches out to Amy to help her escape danger and holds her tightly, reassuring her he won't let go.
Shows concern for the sheriff's condition and listens soberly to the FBI agent's report.
Extends his hand to Amy and encourages her to take action, helping her escape danger.
Holds Amy securely after the crash and reassures her emotionally.
Engages soberly and appropriately with the FBI agent, asking relevant questions about the suspects.
Puts his arm around Amy, pulling her close as they leave the crime scene.
Looks back over his shoulder, surveying the scene one last time before leaving.
Puts his arm around Amy, providing comfort as they leave the chaotic scene.
